ComicInfo.Title: Magick's Menace
ComicInfo.Summary: Magick's Menace: Rimthursar tricks Thor and regains control of his menagerie. Thor stops him by destroying the silver chalice that created the menagerie, but it fails to return the members of the menagerie back into their mortal forms.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:39:59. [Issue ID 36532]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Inker: Chic Stone,Marie Severin,Brett Breeding,Vince Colletta,Chic Stone,Marie Severin,Brett Breeding,Vince Colletta
